languages.text: {n}Поборов отчетливо проявившееся на лице желание плюнуть на труп Инцендии, Владайм на глазах вновь превращается из головореза в холодного бюрократа. Он бросает одному из помощников:{/n} "Тело Ее Светлости поместите в криосклеп и доставьте на ее судно. Проследите, чтобы ему не был причинен вред... еще больший. Мы, конечно, были врагами, но это не повод вести себя нецивилизованно".

{n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."
languages.original_text: {n}Поборов отчетливо проявившееся на лице желание плюнуть на труп Инцендии, Владайм на глазах вновь превращается из головореза в холодного бюрократа. Он бросает одному из помощников:{/n} "Тело Ее Светлости поместите в криосклеп и доставьте на ее судно. Проследите, чтобы ему не был причинен вред... еще больший. Мы, конечно, были врагами, но это не повод вести себя нецивилизованно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym's face clearly shows his desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, but he overcomes it. The cutthroat is turning back into a cold bureaucrat before your very eyes.{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆以明显的努力，克制住了朝因森蒂娅的尸体吐口水的欲望。他收起了那副暴徒的做派，在你面前又重新变回了冷漠的帝国官僚，对他的助手简短地开了口。{/n}“将库尔达女士的尸体放入冷冻舱，送到她的飞船上去。不要对库尔达女士的遗体造成任何损害——当然，我是指不要进一步造成损害。虽然我们曾是敌人，但这并不是行野蛮之事的借口。”
languages.original_text: {n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆以明显的努力，克制住了朝因森蒂娅的尸体吐口水的欲望。他收起了那副暴徒的做派，在你面前又重新变回了冷漠的帝国官僚，对他的助手简短地开了口。{/n}“将库尔达女士的尸体放入冷冻舱，送到她的飞船上去。不要对库尔达女士的遗体造成任何损害——当然，我是指不要进一步造成损害。虽然我们曾是敌人，但这并不是行野蛮之事的借口。”

languages.text: {n}「顔にはっきりと現れている通り、ヴラダイムはインセンディアの死体に唾を吐きかけたいという欲求があったが、なんとか欲望を押さえつけ、乱暴者から冷たい官僚に戻った。彼は仲間の1人に素っ気なく告げる。{/n}「彼女の遺体を冷凍保管庫に入れ、彼女の船に運べ。傷をつけるな。これ以上傷をつけてはいけない。それだけだ。私達は無論、敵であったが、教養のある行動を取らない理由にはならない」
languages.original_text: {n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

traits.locale_text: {n}「顔にはっきりと現れている通り、ヴラダイムはインセンディアの死体に唾を吐きかけたいという欲求があったが、なんとか欲望を押さえつけ、乱暴者から冷たい官僚に戻った。彼は仲間の1人に素っ気なく告げる。{/n}「彼女の遺体を冷凍保管庫に入れ、彼女の船に運べ。傷をつけるな。これ以上傷をつけてはいけない。それだけだ。私達は無論、敵であったが、教養のある行動を取らない理由にはならない」

languages.text: {n}Aguantándose el deseo de escupir en el cadáver de Incendia, Vladaym vuelve a pasar de matón a burócrata. Se dirige brevemente a uno de sus socios.{/n} «Coloque el cuerpo en una criocámara y llévelo a su nave. Asegúrese de que no sufra ningún daño, no más del que ha sufrido... Éramos enemigos, eso es así, pero esa no es razón para actuar de manera incivilizada».
languages.original_text: {n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aguantándose el deseo de escupir en el cadáver de Incendia, Vladaym vuelve a pasar de matón a burócrata. Se dirige brevemente a uno de sus socios.{/n} «Coloque el cuerpo en una criocámara y llévelo a su nave. Asegúrese de que no sufra ningún daño, no más del que ha sufrido... Éramos enemigos, eso es así, pero esa no es razón para actuar de manera incivilizada».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym überwindet das Verlangen, auf Incendias Leiche zu spucken, das ihm deutlich ins Gesicht geschrieben steht. Vor deinen Augen verwandelt er sich von einem Verbrecher in einen kalten Bürokraten. Er befielt einem seiner Getreuen barsch: {/n} "Legt die Leiche ihre Ladyschaft in ein Cryo-Grab und bringt es auf ihr Schiff. Sorgt dafür, dass Ihr kein Schaden zugefügt wird. Jedenfalls nicht noch mehr. Wir waren Feinde, gewiss, doch das ist kein Grund, sich nicht zivilisiert zu verhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym überwindet das Verlangen, auf Incendias Leiche zu spucken, das ihm deutlich ins Gesicht geschrieben steht. Vor deinen Augen verwandelt er sich von einem Verbrecher in einen kalten Bürokraten.{/n} "Legt die Leiche ihre Ladyschaft in ein Cryo-Grab und bringt es auf ihr Schiff. Sorgt dafür, dass Ihr kein Schaden zugefügt wird. Kein zusätzlicher Schaden. Wir waren Feinde, gewiss, doch das ist kein Grund, sich nicht zivilisiert zu verhalten."

languages.text: {n}Surmontant son envie évidente de cracher sur le cadavre d'Incendia, Vladaym le truand se glisse à nouveau dans son rôle de bureaucrate froid et calculateur.{/n} « Mettez le corps de Sa Seigneurie dans une chambre cryogénique et emportez-le à son vaisseau, » {n}ordonne-t-il à ses associés.{/n} « Veillez à ce qu'il ne soit pas endommagé... pas plus que maintenant, du moins. Certes, nous étions ennemis, mais ce n'est pas une raison pour agir comme des barbares. »
languages.original_text: {n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Surmontant son envie évidente de cracher sur le cadavre d'Incendia, Vladaym le truand se glisse à nouveau dans son rôle de bureaucrate froid et calculateur.{/n} « Mettez le corps de Sa Seigneurie dans une chambre cryogénique et emportez-le à son vaisseau, » {n}ordonne-t-il à ses associés.{/n} « Veillez à ce qu'il ne soit pas endommagé... pas plus que maintenant, du moins. Certes, nous étions ennemis, mais ce n'est pas une raison pour agir comme des barbares. »

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın cesedine tükürme arzusunu bastıran Vladaym, yüzündeki ifadeyi silerek eşkıyadan soğukkanlı bir bürokrata dönüşüveriyor. Arkadaşlarından birine nazikçe sözlerini iletiyor.{/n} "Leydi Hazretleri'nin bedenini bir kriyomahzene yerleştirip gemisine götürün. Aman hasar görmesin... Yani daha fazla hasar görmesin. Düşmanımızdı tabii ama bu, medenice davranmamıza mâni değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Overcoming the desire to spit on Incendia's corpse, clearly manifested on his face, Vladaym turns from a thug into a cold bureaucrat again before your eyes. He says curtly to one of his associates,{/n} "Place Her Ladyship's body in a cryo-vault and take it to her ship. Make sure no damage is done to it — no further damage, that is. We were enemies, of course, but that's no reason not to act in a civilised manner."
